sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Boanarges and Barnabas, or, Judgment and mercy for afflicted soules containing of [brace] meditations, soliloquies, and prayers / by Francis Quarles. Boanerges and Barnabas Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
[10], 226 [i.e. 218] p.
Printed by Rich. Cotes for Richard Royston, and Richard Lownes, and are to bee sold at the Vnicorn ..., London : 1646.
Added engraved t.p. Errors in paging: p. 19 misnumbered 15, p. 101-108 omitted in numbering, p. 206-207 misnumbered 196-197. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======

[10], 226 [i.e. 218] p.
Printed by Rich. Cotes for Richard Royston, and Richard Lownes, and are to bee sold at the Vnicorn ..., London : 1646.
Added engraved t.p. Errors in paging: p. 19 misnumbered 15, p. 101-108 omitted in numbering, p. 206-207 misnumbered 196-197. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
Richard Lownes
Richard Royston
Rich. Cotes
the Vnicorn
